Html:
Hi,

I'm currently using GMap.NET version 1.7.0.0. on WPF version. I've found this thread http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/discussions/354017 that says I could change the GMapMarker color. But, I can't find RegenerateRouteShape function, nor Route function on GMapMarker. What should I do?

Thanks.

Regards,
Josses
